description: ID for the imported Student Application Admission Decision Data Load

Decision_Policy_OptionObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Decision_Policy_OptionObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

validation.validation: The specified Admission Decision Reason is not valid for the specified Admission Decision and Student Application Academic Unit and Level.
Cannot render Admission Decision on a Student Application that has a published decision.
Enter a decision of Admit or Deny.
Decision is already in progress for the Student Application.
Decision Date cannot be in the future.
You cannot specify an Admitted Program of Study that is a Formalized Joint Program because the Student Application does not have a Formalized Joint program.
You can only select one program of study with the category of Formalized Joint Program or one of the programs within your Formalized Joint Program.
Student Application must be active.
Cannot render Admission Decision of Admit unless all of the specified Admitted Programs of Study are Standalone.

Cannot render Admission Decision of Admit because the Student Application Anticipated Start date does not fall in between the first and last entry dates of at least one of the specified Programs of Study.
Admitted Program(s) of Study is required for Admission Decision of Admit.
Decision not rendered because Admitted to Program Focus is missing for one of the specified Admitted_Program_of_Study that requires a Program Focus.
The Admitted Program of Study must be the same Formalized Joint program on the application or its Primary or Secondary programs.
You must approve all admitted programs of study before rendering a decision.
Evaluation is already in progress for the Student Application.
Only one Admitted to Program Focus is allowed.
Only one Admitted Program of Study is allowed.
You can't select an Admitted to Anticipated Start Date for an application with a decision of Deny or a Fixed Period Type.
You can’t select an Admitted to Anticipated Start Reference for an application with a decision of Deny or a Dynamic Period Type.
Admitted to Anticipated Start Reference is required for an Admissions Decision of Admit and an Application Period Type of Fixed.
Admitted to Anticipated Start Date is required for an Admissions Decision of Admit and an Application Period Type of Dynamic.
Cannot render Admission Decision of Admit because at least one of the specified Program(s) of Study has an Academic Level that does not match that of the application Program of Study.
You can’t create applications for this academic unit, level, and start date, unless a matching application grouping exists.
Enter a different program of study for the selected applicant type.
Please specify a valid combination of program of study, campus and anticipated start.
Specify a campus location that is active.
Specify an admitted campus.
